name: 3 Minutes Away From Earth
description:
You are falling in your spaceship into the earth, you have 3 minutes to destroy the nearby asteroids that threaten to crash into your ship and return safe to earth.

Explore the spaceship to find a way to destroy those asteroids.

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Jump: Space
Crouch: C
Interact: E
Flashlight: F
Attack: Left Click
